changelogversion.changelogtext: Fix sorting of cold storage mode transactions
Change ModesActivity a bit - rearrange slides and change some text
More idiomatic Kotlin
About Sia slideshow isn't shown on first startup
Fix crash that occurred when entering an invalid URL for remote node address
Fix the last crash on the wallet page, accidentally missed it last time
Fix View seed
Remove refresh button on the toolbar on the refresh page - swipe down instead
Fix some infrequent crashes on the wallet page
Back button on the wallet page will first close any open fragment
Increase minSdk to 21 (Android 5.0). Very few users were on Android versions older than that, and it allows me to use some better, newer Android features
Add pull-down-to-refresh to the wallet page transactions list
Greatly improve the backend workings of the wallet page, particularly of cold storage mode
Remove background services and the option to run in the background - this should reduce battery usage (although it wasn't high in the first place)
Remove sync and transaction notifications - these were done using background services that, as mentioned above, were removed
Rearrange settings page, as well as remove settings that are no longer relevant due to the removal of a majority of background tasks
Change splash screen to a dark background
Improve height of view addresses and seeds fragments
Fix siad loading twice
Improve how Siad is started, stopped, and monitored
Services won't attempt to start in the background on Android O, since it has tighter restrictions on background services
Switch to Firebase crash reporting
Fix crash that occurred when pressing Send on the Donate dialog
Fix crash that occurred when pressing Receive and then replacing the Receive window before it finished retrieving an address
Change the About page
Default theme is now dark
Siad (Sia node) output now also appears in the terminal page
Update Android support libraries. This should hopefully fix some infrequent crashes some users were having
Fix error when trying to send
Fix unconfirmed transactions not appearing in transactions list
Fix USD price estimation (mostly - might have to manual refresh since coincap seems to take a while to respond to requests)
Fix notification icon colors
Disallow certain invalid urls from remote node address that would cause crashes
Cold storage wallet can now estimate your confirmed balance and transactions (experimental)
Higher resolution images in About slideshow
Make the about page better and cooler
Improve a lot of backend code
Wallet seed is shown immediately upon creating a wallet
Disallow setting empty/blank values for settings input fields
